trans-unit.source: title: Step 3: Create a virtual switch
trans-unit.target: title: Step 3: Create a virtual switch

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Create a virtual switch
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Create a virtual switch

trans-unit.source: A virtual switch allows you to create a network connection for your virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: A virtual switch allows you to create a network connection for your virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: They are used just like the network adapter (NIC) on your physical computer.
trans-unit.target: They are used just like the network adapter (NIC) on your physical computer.

trans-unit.source: For this example, we are going to create an External switch.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we are going to create an External switch.

trans-unit.source: The external switch will allow your virtual machine to access the host machine's network adapter.
trans-unit.target: The external switch will allow your virtual machine to access the host machine's network adapter.

trans-unit.source: If your host machine is connected to the internet, your virtual machine will be as well.
trans-unit.target: If your host machine is connected to the internet, your virtual machine will be as well.

trans-unit.source: We'll also set the switch to allow the host to share this network adapter.
trans-unit.target: We'll also set the switch to allow the host to share this network adapter.

trans-unit.source: This makes it so both the virtual machines and the host can use the same network.
trans-unit.target: This makes it so both the virtual machines and the host can use the same network.

trans-unit.source: In Hyper-V manager, click Virtual Switch Manager.
trans-unit.target: In Hyper-V manager, click Virtual Switch Manager.

trans-unit.source: Select New virtual network switch.
trans-unit.target: Select New virtual network switch.

trans-unit.source: Select External and Create Virtual Switch.
trans-unit.target: Select External and Create Virtual Switch.

trans-unit.source: Under Name, type External.
trans-unit.target: Under Name, type External.

trans-unit.source: Under External network, select the correct network adapter (there will probably only be one option).
trans-unit.target: Under External network, select the correct network adapter (there will probably only be one option).

trans-unit.source: Select Allow management operating system to share this network adapter and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Select Allow management operating system to share this network adapter and click OK.

trans-unit.source: You'll get a message warning you that your network might disconnect while the virtual switch is created.
trans-unit.target: You'll get a message warning you that your network might disconnect while the virtual switch is created.

trans-unit.source: Just click Yes.
trans-unit.target: Just click Yes.

trans-unit.source: Your network will be unavailable for a short time.
trans-unit.target: Your network will be unavailable for a short time.

trans-unit.source: Next step:
trans-unit.target: Next step:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Step 4: Create a Windows virtual machine from an .iso file</linkText><title></title></link>
